name: Magicanna ~ Fennec Play
description:
Game Jam entry for Ludum Dare #35 - Shapeshifters

At Rosemarie Academy, a school for young witches, three girls find a mysterious girl- however, she's on the run! Can the girls save her?

This one was actually a toughy for me, since I have had these characters for years but had to establish them for people who had never seen them. I hope I was able to convey even a bit of their personalities in the short 72 hour time frame Ludum Dare allows, but I do think I'll add to this game post-LD!
